ygData.subject: RE: Bard Superstitions?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m inclined to believe it.  There was nothing that I could have done to taunt the hag and she mad a beeline through to me and that included bypassing an
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 3 Sep 1999 kim@... wrote:
>
> I swear there is code that says if you are about to level or
> just have leveled, it acts like a taunt... :-)

I'm inclined to believe it. There was nothing that I could have done to
taunt the hag and she mad a beeline through to me and that included
bypassing an entire group in combat.

> Do you know about the emergency exit from the hand room? Out
> the door to the roof, then jump down to the main path leading
> to the zone. Your safefall should prevent you from taking any
> damage from the jump.

Yes I turned around and high tailed it out the door onto the roof and
falling to the ground level. Unfortunately I didn't have anything trained
in Safe fall =(. Time to go and train I guess =). BTW my group w just
continued to sit there after I ran and the were not attacked. Luckily one
of the casters fizzled while trying to cast on the hag. If it was
successful you would have seen more people flying of the roof Unrest.

Treilanin Loreweaver
Honour Guard, Karana
